channel.title: Marshall Lab on Marshall Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Marshall Lab on Marshall Lab

item.title: Antimicrobial Tolerance and Resistance
item.description: Using high-throughput, automated serial passaging innovations to study antimicrobial tolerance and resistance in biofilm populations. Specifically, I am interested in multi-strain and species interactions that alter antibiotic resistance outcomes.

item.title: Dynamic Biofilm Surveillance with Bioelectrochemical Systems
item.description: I use bioelectrochemical systems (electrodes) to monitor electron transfer reactions in biofilms. These systems allow for the real-time study of disturbance challenges, diffusion limitations, and metabolic turnover of the microbial population or community
